tool.name: Scater: filter SCE
tool.command: #if $filter_type.filter_type_selector == 'manual': Rscript '$__tool_directory__/scater-manual-filter.R' -i '$input_loom' #if str($filter_type.detection_limit): --detection-limit ${filter_type.detection_limit} #end if #if str($filter_type.library_size): --library-size ${filter_type.library_size} #end if #if str($filter_type.percent_counts_MT): --percent-counts-MT ${filter_type.percent_counts_MT} #end if #else: Rscript '$__tool_directory__/scater-pca-filter.R' -i '$input_loom' #end if -o '$output_loom'

param.name: detection_limit
param.label: Number of reads mapped to a gene for it to be counted as expressed
param.help: Raising this number will raise the stringency and may lower the number of expressed genes

param.name: library_size
param.label: Minimum library size (mapped reads) to filter cells on
param.help: Raising this number will raise the stringency and may lower the number of included cells

param.name: percent_counts_MT
param.label: Maximum % of mitochondrial genes expressed per cell
param.help: Cells that exceed this value will be filtered out

tool.help:
Filter a SingleCellLoomExperiment object with Scater using one of the following methods:
- user-defined parameters - PCA to automatically removes outliers.
